boardgame.name: Canción de hielo y fuego: El juego de miniaturas
A Song of Ice _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game – Stark vs Lannister Starter Set
A Song of Ice and Fire: 桌上戰棋遊戲
Песнь льда и огня: Настольная игр с миниатюрами. Стартовый набор «Старки против Ланнистеров»
boardgame.description: A Song of Ice _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game lets players take control of their favorite Houses from the novels _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; represented by trays of high-quality, pre-assembled miniatures _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and lead them into battle against their opponents. Players can recreate their favorite moments from the series or create their own stories. What if the Red Wedding never happened, and Robb Stark assaulted King's Landing? Now fans can find out!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Battles can range from large-scale wars with hundreds of miniatures to simple skirmishes between a few units without complicating the elegantly designed rules. The game features several unique systems, including alternating activations that keep the players engaged; a Rank System that changes a unit's capabilities as the battle rages on; a Tactics System that provides strategic powers fueled by a finite resource each round; and, most importantly, the iconic Heroes, such as Robb Stark and Jaime Lannister, that can change the course of war both on and off the battlefield._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Stark vs Lannister Starter Set has everything needed for two players to fight epic battles. Containing forces for both House Stark and House Lannister, players build their armies, select leaders, construct their tactics deck, and engage in one of five different game modes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: NOT for the game listed. This item is for the captain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s promo set. This item is for Mgosiris, winner of the auction for this item from the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;US Auction, CMON Games/Promos until May 19 2018_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Shipping will be $5.
Language: english Publisher: Cool Mini Or Not Game Condition: Mint Box Condition: Mint PREORDER - Usually available in: waiting for ETA from the producer approx ID Gis: 32180 (for reference)

*** PREORDER WITH EXPECTED DELIVERY Q2 2018*** Contents: Kickstarter _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Hand of the King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Pledge Edition of A Song of Ice and Fire Table Top Game. Includes core game, KS Exclusive non-combat character _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The High Seneschal,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; plus all stretch goals. Please note: unless otherwise stated paid add ons from the Kickstarter Campaign are not included.

Hand of the King Kickstarter pledge with all 80 gagillion stretch goals (no add ons, just stretch goals). Details can be found here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/cmon/a-song-of-ice-and-fire-tabletop-miniatures-game It is all still new in box / sealed, I will be shipping in the original CMON Kickstarter box. ********* Shipping will be a flat $20 to the continental US ********* I am not looking to make a huge profit off this Kickstarter, just recoup my costs since I no longer have time for miniatures games. Trying to get back the cost of the pledge + what I paid for shipping, then build in a bit extra for the various fees I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to pay, so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not trying to flip this for double the profit or something :). Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
Inkl. Kickstarter Stretch Goals Shipping: Germany 8,49€ Europe 20,99€

I am selling my kickstarter copy of A song of Ice and Fire: Tabletop Miniatures game. This is the based pledge, with all kickstarter exclusives and additions. Everything is still in shrink. I am a seller based in the Netherlands. I will ship worldwide, taking into account that buyer will pay for any shipping costs. Method of shipment can be discussed on a case by case basis. For payment, I accept both Paypal and Bank Transfer. Further payment details will be provided after sale has been confirmed. Shipment will commence after full payment has been provided. You will always receive a track and trace code to follow your shipment. Local buyers have the option to pick up the item(s) from my home address in Herten, Limburg. Also here, full details will be provided after sale has been confirmed.

Reserved for I AM LEGEND Includes Everything from the KS, Every Stretch Goal, Every KS Exclusive Add-on. 1 Pledge level $150 1 Knights of Casterly Rock 1 Lannister Crossbowmen 1 Tully Sworn Shields 1 Bolton Cutthroats 1 Battle of Blackwater Bay Playmat 1 Battle in the Whispering Woods Playmat 1 Battle at the Mummer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Ford Playmat 1 Plastic Terrain Bundle 1 House Lannister Dice Bag 1 House Stark Dice Bag 1 Mercenaries Dice Bag 1 House Lannister Plastic Ruler 1 House Stark Plastic Ruler 1 Mercenaries Plastic Ruler Buyer pays shipping. This thing is huge and in 3 Boxes already. OBO maybe accepted.

Selling my Pledge. You bid for the basic 150,00$ pledge - no add-ons extra! including all Stretch Goals. In hand and ready to ship! Shipping has to be added. In germany 8,99€. Rest asks for quote. Paypal fees to buyer.

This is the Kickstarter Edition, it includes plastic tokens, the Iron Throne miniature and other Kickstarter exclusive miniatures. To check what is in the box, please go to: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/cmon/a-song-of-ice-and-fire-tabletop-miniatures-game Free delivery within Netherlands, for other shipping costs, please check my website: https://boardgameshop.nl/winkel/specials/ I offer different payment options: (Paypal, IDeal, Banconfort, Afterpay, VISA and Maestro).

This is for the following parts of the Kickstarter version: - Stark, Lannister and Mercenary plastic Rulers (3 rulers) - Stark, Lannister and Mercenary plastic Activation Tokens (30 activation tokens) - Stark, Lannister and Mercenary Custom Engraved Dice Sets (30 dice in total) - Plastic Tokens pack (35 plastic tokens) - First Player Token - The Iron Chair All parts are still in their original packaging.
